about_the_game:
Having just dealt with the roughest time in her life, Juri Kido's luck is finally turning around. At the invitation of her best friend, Juri moves to the small, coastal town of Akiyama; leaving behind the big city of Tokyo for good. But what Juri doesn’t know is just what kind of place this cozy locale really is...

Because Akiyama is not only home to a massive red-light district, but also houses the biggest, hottest, and weirdest love hotel in the world; HOTEL BAKUDAN!

After meeting seven beautiful ladies and scoring a job at the hotel, Juri knows that this is the golden opportunity she's been searching for. With so much sex, drama and romance at every turn, Juri has no doubt that living in Akiyama is going to change her life. Just what awaits her on these sunny shores?

Welcome to HOTEL BAKUDAN. We hope you enjoy your stay!



☆ Seven unique romance routes! Choose from a gorgeous MILF, a yakuza queen, a ghost-hunting BFF, a charming P.I., a cool-as-ice vigilante, an aloof heiress and a melancholy hostess! Who's gonna be YOUR best girl?

☆ Steamy NSFW CGs! With gorgeous artwork depicting the intense encounters Juri has with each love interest, you won't miss out on the explicit side of Akiyama's beauties!

☆ Work at HOTEL BAKUDAN! Help Juri assign hotel guests the kinky rooms of their dreams! Ranging from silly to sexy, working at the hotel is never a bore. If you get all of them right, you just might score something special...and what's that, we hear you ask? It's our next feature, of course!

☆ 35 unlockable erotic books! Interested in getting hot and bothered? Good! RENAI BAKUDAN not only has sexual encounters within the routes, but plenty of dirty stories to enjoy on the side! Which will be your favourite?

☆ Explore Akiyama! See what's going on across town throughout each girl's story! With the variety of locations being different per route, there's no shortage of things to see and girls to bump into!

☆ An interactive adaptation of our yuri yakuza webnovel, TOKUGAWA BLUES! Read TokuBlues in a fully immersive experience, complete with backgrounds, music and SFX!

☆ Streamer mode! Wanna show off Juri's big adventure but don't want to get banned for flashing anime tiddies? Streamer mode covers up the nudity so your stream stays squeaky clean!

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit sexual content (visual and written), profanity, alcohol and tobacco use, organized crime.
